resources.string: "These services put Google to work for you, and you can turn them on or off at any time. Data will be used in accordance with Google's "Privacy Policy.
"Back up your phone's apps, app data, settings, personal dictionaries and Wi‑Fi passwords" using your Google Account so that you can easily restore later. Learn more
Back up your apps, app data, settings, personal dictionaries and Wi‑Fi passwords using your Google Account so that you can easily restore later.
Data includes apps, app settings, system settings and Wi‑Fi passwords.

"When you turn on automatic backup, your device's data is periodically saved to your Google Account. Backups may include information in your app data folders, like preferences, settings, messages, photos and other files."
"Use Google's location service" to help apps determine location. This means sending anonymous location data to Google, even when no apps are running. Learn more

"Google's location service uses sources like Wi‑Fi and mobile networks to help estimate your device's location faster and more accurately. When you turn on Google's location services, your device enters a mode that uses Wi‑Fi and mobile networks to provide location information. You can turn this off in location settings by choosing a mode that uses GPS only, sometimes called Device only mode."
Help improve location services by letting apps and services scan for Wi‑Fi networks even when Wi‑Fi is off.

"Google's location service uses Wi‑Fi and other signals to determine location more precisely and quickly, often with lower power usage than GPS. Some data may be stored on your device. Data may be collected even when no apps are running."
Keep me up to date with news and offers from Google Play.

Help improve your Android experience" by automatically sending diagnostic and usage data to Google. This information won't be used to identify you and lends a hand to teams working on things like battery life, app performance and new Google features. "Learn more

"This is general information about your device and how you use it, such as battery level, how often you use your apps, the quality and duration of your network connections (like mobile, Wi‑Fi and Bluetooth), and crash reports when things aren't working the way that they should. It will be used to improve Google's products and services for everyone, and won't be associated with your Google Account. Some aggregated information will help partners, such as Android developers, make their apps and products better, too.
You can turn this on or off at any time in the Google Settings app. This doesn't affect your device's ability to send the information it needs to receive essential services such as system updates and security."

"This phone may also receive and install updates and apps from Google, your operator and your phone's manufacturer. Some apps may be downloaded and installed if you continue, and you can remove them at any time."
"Your phone isn't connected to a mobile data service. To view this information now, go to %s in a web browser."

Touch Activate" to activate your mobile service now. (It may take a couple of minutes.)
Or touch "Skip to set up your phone using a Wi-Fi connection instead.
Touch Activate to activate your mobile service now. (It may take a couple of minutes.)

"Until you activate your mobile data service, most of your phone's features won't work.
If you prefer to skip now, you can activate later in System settings."
Tap Skip to complete set up using a Wi-Fi connection instead.
Activation can take a few minutes. Touch Skip to complete setup using a Wi-Fi connection instead.
This can take up to 5 minutes

"The phone is activating your mobile data service.
This can take up to 5 minutes."
Activation can take a few minutes.
Activation can take a few minutes.
Touch Next to continue with setup.
Your device needs to restart to complete activation.

Touch Next" to continue.
Activation successful, but it may take a few minutes for the mobile data network to become available."

"Try again in a minute or restart your phone if this continues to happen.
If you prefer to skip now,make sure that you activate later in System settings. Until you activate, your phone won't have a mobile data connection."
"Your mobile data service couldn't be activated. This may be a temporary problem and may be solved by restarting the phone."

"Couldn't activate mobile data service. To try activation again, tap "Try again".
You can activate your mobile data service later in "System settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks
Cancelling activation… this might take 5-10 seconds.

"Do you want to cancel activation? You need to activate your mobile network service before you can use it to connect to the Internet.
Touch "Next" to complete setup using a Wi-Fi connection.
You can activate your mobile network service later in "System settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks.

"Activation cancelled.
You can activate your mobile data service later in "System settings > Wireless & networks > Mobile networks.

There was an error that requires shutting down and restarting your phone before you can make another activation attempt. Your phone will shut down automatically in 60 seconds or you can tap Shut down now".
Once your phone has shut down, press the Power button to restart it. Activation will start up automatically."
"If you skip activation, make sure that you activate later in Settings. Until you activate, your phone won't have a mobile data connection."
Your account needs to be updated
Tap here to re-run the Setup Wizard.
Your first account is ready for use. You can add and remove accounts later in Settings.
Select a SIM for mobile data
Select a SIM for text messages

"If you skip:
Your phone won’t have an Internet connection.
You won’t get software updates until you connect to the Internet.
You can’t activate device protection features at this time."
Taking too long? Try going back and connecting to a different network.
Your phone needs to download an update and restart.
By continuing and receiving this software update, you agree to the Google Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
By signing in, you are agreeing to the Google Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Google Play Terms of Service.
"Your Android device isn't connected to a Wi-Fi network. To view this information now, visit %s with a web browser."
Continue touching the screen until you hear a beep to enable Accessibility mode.
Prevent others from using this phone without your permission by activating device protection features. Learn more
You will be guided to set up your screen lock if you choose yes.
Protect this device and require a PIN, pattern or password to unlock the screen
Set up PIN, pattern or password
"Your screen lock has been set up successfully. "Learn more

"Device protection is automatically activated when you add a Google Account and set a screen lock. Combined with Android Device Manager, this helps you locate and erase your phone if it’s lost or stolen.
Even if your phone gets wiped, your Google Account password will be required before anyone can use this phone."

Device protection is automatically activated when you add a Google Account and set a screen lock. Combined with Android Device Manager, this helps you locate and erase your phone if it’s lost or stolen.
"Device protection features will not be activated. You won't be able to prevent others from using this phone if it's lost, stolen or wiped."
Device protection features will not be activated. You won’t be able to prevent others from using this phone if it’s lost or stolen.
Let Google check all installed apps for potentially harmful behaviour that might affect the security of your device or data.
No backups available for source device.
Unfortunately, the device stopped restoring data from the backup.
Adding your name allows your phone to personalise some apps.
This phone is managed by “%1$s”, which means that some of your information may be visible to other people. To prevent monitoring, reset your phone.
Warning: Resetting will erase all accounts and data on this phone’s internal storage.
Erase all accounts and data on this phone? You can’t undo this action!

"To use this phone, you first have to sign in to an owner’s Google Account in use on this phone when it was last reset.
Because you haven’t done so, you have to set up the phone again."
%s has added you to this phone.
You have been added to this phone.

Important:"
"
The phone’s owner can uninstall your apps or remove your space completely."
"
Any other user can accept updated app permissions on your behalf."
"
As with any computer, you should only share this phone with people whom you trust.

" "Important:"
"
The phone’s owner can install and uninstall apps, set limits or remove your space completely."
"
Any other user can accept updated app permissions on your behalf."
"
As with any computer, you should only share this phone with people whom you trust.
